participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and health-conscious with a competitive spirit. Enjoys showcasing an active lifestyle on social media.
participant_1.background: I got a scholarship for playing soccer. I obsess over working out and being the best. I try to eat healthy or I do not eat at all. It's important for my Instagram posts to look like I am having fun. I want people to think I am cool.

participant_2.name: Lena
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and a bit forgetful, with a love for nature and music. She has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I recently moved to Sweden. I enjoy hiking on glaciers. Marduk is my favorite band. Lutefisk is the best dish in the whole world. I always seem to be losing things, most recently, my mind.

content.text: It's going well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great! Just got back from a hike on a glacier.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to hike on a glacier.
It was really cool! The views were incredible.
I bet they were! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love hiking, biking, and camping. I also enjoy playing guitar and listening to music.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love hiking and biking too. I'm not so much into camping, but I do enjoy it occasionally.
I'm glad to hear that! We should go hiking sometime.
That would be great! I'm free this weekend, if you are.
Unfortunately, I'm not free this weekend. But I'm free next weekend.
That's okay. I'm free next weekend too.
Great! Let's plan on going hiking next weekend.
Sounds good! What time and where should we meet?
I'm free anytime after 10am. We could meet at the trailhead for Mount Tammany.
That sounds good to me. I'll see you there!
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
